results.name: a(n) = - sin^2((2n-1)*arccos(sqrt n)) = sin^2((2n-1)*arcsin(sqrt n)) - 1.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..170
mathematica: Table[Round[-N[ Sin[(2 n - 1) ArcCos[Sqrt[n]]]^2, 100]], {n, 0, 20}] (* _Artur Jasinski_, Feb 11 2010; Typo fixed by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 29 2014 *)
